Title: Provides that the winnings from off-track betting, remaining unclaimed by April 1 each year, shall become part of the regional off-track betting corporation's operating account; repealer
Summary: Provides that the winnings from off-track betting, remaining unclaimed by April 1 each year, shall become part of the regional off-track betting corporation's operating account.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
LawCode: Rpld & add ยง529 sub 2, RWB L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to unclaimed winnings and refunds from off-track pari-mutuel betting; and to repeal subdivision 2 of section 529 of such law relating thereto
